Admission Now

RAINBOW COLOURS Family Day Care

At Rainbow Colours Family Day Care, we understand the importance of a supportive and nurturing environment for your little ones. Our family daycare is designed to be a haven where children flourish through play, exploration, and genuine care.

We are registered with My Home Your Home Family Day Care.

Contact Us

About us

We offer a safe environment for children, to be themselves, to explore, to get positive strokes. We lead them gently so they pick up a routine and learn to be helpful and kind.
Registered with My Home Your Home Family Day Care

Our Facilities Art & Games Food & Beverage

About our facilities

Our family daycare responds to evolving educational programs by providing a physical setting that is comfortable, safe and secure.

About our music and arts

Art and games encourage youngsters to examine creativity more deeply, think about it, and discuss it. They provide a framework for faculties to build on children's observations, understandings, and discussions about creativity.

About our daily meals

Kids need to bring their own breakfast, lunch and afternoon tea.
